text: I called customer service for a simple question, but they told me to come to the bank.  They then hung up on me without properly ending the call.  Very rude.
The Bank Manager Mr. Malhotra was super helpful and prompt in assisting me with getting my KYC completed as well as promptly dispatching the physical documents to the home branch in India.

Poor communication with the customer. I had some formalities to be completed for my BOI account in India. I called the BOI Singapore branch to check if it can be done here. They said they'll do it. When I reached there after 30 min travel they said they'll charge $10 and if I want I can complete the formalities myself by emailing the Indian bank. They could have told me this before.

I expressed my dissatisfaction but not even a sorry came from them and the staff just walked away. Worst service experienced.
Thank you so much Dinesh Yadav and sadhna Mam help me to open NRE account in Singapore to india branch thanksüôè
